Our cooking oil brand Delima has had its 1-litre pouches modified to a thinner packaging that requires less plastic since January 2018, and we have done the same this year for our new Amanda 1-litre cooking oil product.
In FY22, DMPI achieved 29% average sugar reduction and 27% average sodium reduction for certain SKUs.
